name.en: General Payment Type for Invoice Payment

description.en:
extends the CTP Payment Resource with the standard fields for direct invoice (goods first) payments to the merchant.
Different from Cash Advance payments (money first). Differs from Risk-Managed Invoicing Services like Klarna.
Near Identical to CASH_ADVANCE, but with some extra fields.

label.en: Hint to the PSP integration service, which language to take from CTP LString / LEnum data. ISO language code.
Short reference code that the buyer is supposed to include in the money transfer to allow identification.
Full Name of the Bank Account Holder the invoice was paid from.
Full machine-read formatted IBAN the invoice was paid from (i.e. no spaces or separators).
Full BIC the invoice was paid from (no spaces or separators).
Full Name of the Bank Account Holder to refund to.
Full machine-read formatted IBAN to refund to (i.e. no spaces or separators).
Full BIC to refund to (no spaces or separators).
The point in time the Invoice is due.
the Invoice ID / Number / Code generated by the payment Interface. E.g. for getting the Invoice PDF etc.
